messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

for issue sent wednesday for issue hello could you please open incident based below put normal escalation path best regards sent tuesday for issue legate for la frankfurt ca language pack se pare ca language pack care la for sa va se face mine pack sa engineer
